about_the_game:
In the 4th millennium, Earth has become a global mega cooperation with a main export being dodgeballs. Destined to deliver a shipment of rare and expensive dodgeballs to a far away planet, our protagonists, Earth Representatives 549 and 744 encounter turmoil when their ship is struck by space debris. The Earth Reps. are then forced to make an emergency landing on a hostile planet known as "Yubglub."

In order to survive, our protagonists must make use their dodgeballs to protect themselves from the alien onslaught and find safety all while learning more about this mysterious planet, and their purpose...

Destined to deliver a shipment of rare and expensive dodgeballs to a far away planet, our protagonists, Earth Representatives 549 and 744 encounter turmoil when their ship is struck by space debris. The Earth Reps. are then forced to make an emergency landing on a hostile planet known as "Yubglub."

In order to survive, our protagonists must make use their dodgeballs to protect themselves from the alien onslaught and find safety all while learning more about this mysterious planet, and their purpose...
name: Survive Planet Yubglub

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Survive Planet Yubglub is a survival rouge-lite, where Earth Representatives must hurl dodgeballs while evading toxic slime aliens and their lethal projectiles. The Earth Reps. must carefully navigate through the harsh environment of planet Yubglub. Choose your character, and Survive Planet Yubglub!
